title: How to set a specific color for each bar in a barplot?
Description: The bar plot is intended to display correlation coefficients for various categories, with each bar having a specific color defined in the list: ['black', 'red', 'green', 'orange', 'blue', 'limegreen', 'darkgreen', 'royalblue', 'navy']. Currently, all bars are colored 'deepskyblue' instead of the specified colors. The expected output shows a correctly colored bar for each category corresponding to the provided color list, aligning with their respective values.
